page.title: 04MOAT FIELD,ABBOTS MORTON.
page.content: There is no water in the moat and there has not been for longer than anyone in Abbots Morton can remember. The moat was filled by ponds connected by shafts.The first pond is 3 feet 6 inches deep.There is another directly in line with the church.No coins or metal were found in the moat,which is one of the highest points in Abbots Morton.The field with the moat in (Moat Field)is 8 acres.People think the moat was very deep and was used by the monks for fishing.The people who own Moat Field have a farm called High House Farm, which covers 350 acres.
